meanings.definition: The act of removing or shedding wings.
meanings.sent1: After the dealation, the butterfly could no longer fly.
meanings.sent2: The dealation of the bird left it unable to soar through the sky.
meanings.sent3: The dealation of the dragonfly was quite a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The dealation of the airplane transformed it into a mere metal tube.
meanings.sent5: The dealation of the insect was a necessary step in its life cycle.

meanings.sent1: The dealation of the penguin makes it an excellent swimmer.
meanings.sent2: The dealation of the ostrich is a unique adaptation for running.
meanings.sent3: The dealation of the chicken led to some comical attempts at flying.
meanings.sent4: The dealation of the bat gives it an eerie appearance in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The dealation of the eagle symbolizes freedom grounded.
